Squares
Squares

CAD$4.00 - CAD$5.25



Dessert Squares

Brownies: chewy fudge brownies loaded with pecans and chocolate chips frosted with chocolate buttercream. Nanaimo: classic 3 layer bars with chocolate coconut base, creamy custard filling and chocolate topping. Date squares: sumptuous date filling with a buttery oatmeal crumble Lemon squares: shortbread crust topped with tangy lemon filling. Magic bars: graham crumb base topped with coconut, pecans, chocolate chips, Skor bits and sweetened condensed milk. Sweet Marie bar: salty and sweet combination of pecans, peanut butter and chocolate. $4.50 each
CAD$4.50
